languages.text: [Обратиться торжественно] "К вам обращается Вольный Торговец, Лорд-капитан этого корабля! Ваши родители отдали жизни за правое дело, не посрамив знамен фон Валанциус и Империума. Я горжусь ими и верю, что вы станете им достойными наследниками!"

traits.locale_text: [Обратиться торжественно] "Дети храбрых служителей династии фон Валанциус, к вам обращается Вольный Торговец, Лорд-Капитан этого корабля! Ваши родители отдали жизни за правое дело, не посрамив знамен фон Валанциус и Империума. Я горжусь ими и верю, что вы станете им достойными наследниками!"

languages.text: [Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"
languages.original_text: [Обратиться торжественно] "К вам обращается Вольный Торговец, Лорд-капитан этого корабля! Ваши родители отдали жизни за правое дело, не посрамив знамен фон Валанциус и Империума. Я горжусь ими и верю, что вы станете им достойными наследниками!"

traits.locale_text: [Address the children solemnly] "Children of the brave servants of the von Valancius dynasty, I, Rogue Trader, Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause, without dishonoring the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

[Address the children solemnly] "Children of the brave servants of the von Valancius dynasty, I, Rogue Trader, Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause, without dishonoring the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

[Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

[Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

[Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

[Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

languages.text: [郑重地发表演讲]“我，行商浪人，这艘飞船的领主舰长，在此正式发言！你们的父母为正义的事业献出了生命，为冯·瓦兰修斯家族与帝国的旗帜带来了荣耀。我为他们感到自豪，我相信你们会成为不辱他们威名的继承人！”
languages.original_text: [Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

traits.locale_text: [郑重地对孩子们讲话] “冯·瓦兰修斯家族英勇仆人的孩子们啊，我，行商浪人，这艘飞船的领主舰长，正式向你们发言！你们的父母为正义的事业献出了生命，为冯·瓦兰修斯家族与帝国的旗帜带来了荣耀。我为他们感到自豪，我相信你们会成为不辱他们威名的继承人！”

languages.text: [Dirigirte al grupo con grandeza] «¡Yo, vuestr{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente y Lord Capitán de la nave, tengo algo que deciros! Vuestros padres dieron sus vidas por una causa justa y han traído honor a los estandartes de la casa von Valancius y del Imperium. ¡Estoy orgullos{mf|o|a} de ellos y confío en que seáis sus dignos sucesores!»
languages.original_text: [Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

traits.locale_text: [Dirigirte solemnemente a los niños] «Hijos de los valientes siervos de la casa von Valancius: ¡yo, vuestr{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente y L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} de la nave, tengo algo que deciros! Vuestros padres dieron sus vidas por una causa justa y han traído honor a los estandartes de la casa von Valancius y del Imperium. ¡Estoy orgullos{mf|o|a} de ellos y confío en que seáis sus dignos sucesores!»

languages.text: [堂々と集団に演説する]「自由開拓者であり、この船のロード・キャプテンである{mf|俺|私}が今、諸君に語りかける！諸君の両親は正義のために命を捧げ、フォン・ヴァランシウスと帝国の御旗に名誉をもたらした。{mf|俺|私}は彼らを誇りに思う。そして、諸君が立派に彼らの跡を継いでくれると信じている！」
languages.original_text: [Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

traits.locale_text: [堂々と集団に演説する]「自由開拓者であり、この船のロード・キャプテンである{mf|俺|私}が今、諸君に語りかける！諸君の両親は正義のために命を捧げ、フォン・ヴァランシウスと帝国の御旗に名誉をもたらした。{mf|俺|私}は彼らを誇りに思う。そして、諸君が立派に彼らの跡を継いでくれると信じている！」

languages.text: [Die Gruppe feierlich ansprechen] "Ich, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und Lord Captain dieses Schiffs, spreche hiermit zu euch! Eure Eltern haben ihr Leben für eine aufrechte Sache gegeben und den Bannern derer von Valancius und des Imperiums Ehre gemacht. Ich bin stolz auf sie und glaube, dass ihr zu würdigen Erben heranwachsen werdet!"
languages.original_text: [Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

traits.locale_text: [Die Gruppe feierlich ansprechen] "Ich, {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} und Lord Captain dieses Schiffs, spreche hiermit zu euch! Eure Eltern haben ihr Leben für eine aufrechte Sache gegeben und den Bannern derer von Valancius und des Imperiums Ehre gemacht. Ich bin stolz auf sie und glaube, dass ihr zu würdigen Erben heranwachsen werdet!"

languages.text: [Prononcer un discours grandiloquent] « C'est en ma qualité de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} de ce vaisseau que je m'adresse à vous en cette heure solennelle. En donnant leur vie pour une cause juste, vos parents ont fait honneur aux bannières des von Valancius de même qu'à celles de l'Imperium. Je suis {mf|fier|fière} d'eux et j'ai la certitude que vous saurez vous montrer dignes de leur courage ! »
languages.original_text: [Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"

traits.locale_text: [Prononcer un discours solennel] « Enfants des vaillants serviteurs de la maison von Valancius, je m'adresse à vous en ma qualité de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} de ce vaisseau ! En donnant leur vie pour une cause juste, vos parents ont fait honneur aux bannières des von Valancius de même qu'à celles de l'Imperium. Je suis {mf|fier|fière} d'eux et j'ai la certitude que vous saurez vous montrer dignes de leur courage ! »

languages.text: [Tüm görkeminle gruba hitap et] "Bendeniz, Hür Tacir ve bu geminin Lord Kaptan'ıyım. Bana kulak verin! Ebeveynleriniz, soylu bir dava uğruna canını vererek von Valancius sancağını ve İmparatorluk'u onurlandırdı. Her biriyle gurur duyuyor, sizin de ailenize layık vârisler olarak yetişeceğinize inanıyorum!"
languages.original_text: [Grandly address the group] "I, the Rogue Trader and Lord Captain of this ship, speak to you now! Your parents gave their lives for a just cause and brought honour to the von Valancius banners and those of the Imperium. I am proud of them, and I believe that you will become their worthy heirs!"
